com.magnet.async

Interface StateListener


  • @Contract
public interface StateListener
    The listener to be invoked in the UI thread when the call state is changed. For asynchronous calls, before performing any UI operations in this listener, the caller should check if the Context is still valid. For reliable calls, the caller can get the Context using injection: 
    

    • 







    

  • 


      

    •

onStateChanged(Call<?> call)
